fastvector package¶

Submodules¶

fastvector.vector module¶

Own implementation of a ND vector class.

class fastvector.vector.VectorND(*args, dtype='d')[source]¶

Bases: object

VectorND class to perform simple vector operations.

Callable for the vector instance to return its representation.

__ge__(other, NotImplemented=NotImplemented)¶

Return a >= b. Computed by @total_ordering from (not a < b).

__getitem__(idx) → Union[int, float][source]¶

Returns the vector item at index idx.

Parameters
idxint

The index idx

Returns
number

If idx < len: returns the value. Else, IndexError.

__gt__(other, NotImplemented=NotImplemented)¶

Return a > b. Computed by @total_ordering from (not a < b) and (a != b).

__hash__ = None¶
__init__(*args, dtype='d')[source]¶

Creates a vector instance with the given x and y values.

Parameters
argstuple

The vector values.

dtypestr

The dtype of the underlying array.

Raises
TypeError

If x or y are not a number.

__le__(other, NotImplemented=NotImplemented)¶

Return a <= b. Computed by @total_ordering from (a < b) or (a == b).

__len__() → int[source]¶

Returns the length of the ND vector

Returns
int

The length for a ND vector is always 2.
